original_text: Now therefore, if ye have done truly and sincerely, in that ye have made Abimelech king, and if ye have dealt well with Jerubbaal and his house, and have done unto him according to the deserving of his hands;
korean_text: 이제 너희가 아비멜렉을 세워 왕으로 삼았으니 너희가 행한 것이 과연 진실하고 의로우냐 이것이 여룹바알과 그의 집을 선대함이냐 이것이 그의 손이 행한 대로 그에게 보답함이냐

sentences.original_text: if ye have done truly and sincerely
in that ye have made Abimelech king
and if ye have dealt well with Jerubbaal and his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만일 너희가 여룹바알과 그의 집을 선대했다면

sentences.original_text: and have done unto him according to the deserving of his hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 손이 한 일에 따라 그에게 행했다면
